args.project_description: 开发一个基于AI的大数据分析平台，专注于金融行业的风险管理

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'BigDataFinance.get_common_funding_methods', 'description': 'Get the common funding methods in the big data industry', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_methods', 'description': 'a list of common funding methods in the big data industry'}]}, {'name': 'BigDataFinance.get_funding_cases', 'description': 'Get funding cases of big data companies', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_cases', 'description': 'a list of funding cases of big data companies'}]}, {'name': 'BigDataFinance.get_funding_trends', 'description': 'Get the current funding trends in the big data industry', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_trends', 'description': 'a list of current funding trends in the big data industry'}]}, {'name': 'BigDataFinance.get_funding_advice', 'description': 'Get funding advice based on a specific big data project', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'project_description', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'a brief description of the big data project'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'funding_advice', 'description': 'a list of funding advice based on the project description'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名创业者，正在开发一个大数据项目。我想了解大数据的融资情况。首先，获取大数据行业常见的融资方式。然后，获取一些大数据企业的融资案例。接着，获取当前大数据行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的大数据项目，提供一些融资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取大数据行业常见的融资方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
BigDataFinance.get_common_funding_methods
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'funding_methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Angel Investment', 'Initial Public Offering (IPO)', 'Private Equity', 'Crowdfunding']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_methods': ['Venture Capital', 'Angel Investment', 'Initial Public Offering (IPO)', 'Private Equity', 'Crowdfunding']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
